Get ESPN men's college basketball player box scores

espn_mbb_player_box.Rd

Get ESPN men's college basketball player box scores

espn_mbb_player_box(game_id)

Arguments

game_id

Game ID

Author

Saiem Gilani

Examples


 espn_mbb_player_box(game_id = 401256760)

#>    athlete_display_name team_short_display_name min   fg fg3    ft oreb dreb
